text: Scatarie Bank is a bank on the continental shelf off the northeast coast of Nova Scotia, Canada. It represents the remains of a volcanic centre that was constructed along a fracture zone during the Cretaceous period. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Undersea banks of the Atlantic Ocean Category:Cretaceous volcanoes Category:Volcanoes of Nova Scotia Category:Cretaceous Nova Scotia
title: Scatarie Bank
